title: List of prime ministers of Luxembourg
summary: The Prime Minister of Luxembourg (Luxembourgish: Premier Minister vu Lëtzebuerg; French: Premier ministre luxembourgeois; German: Premierminister von Luxemburg) is the head of government of Luxembourg. His official residence and office is in the Hôtel de Bourgogne at 4 Rue de la Congrégation in the city of Luxembourg.
